preconditions.precondition: The buzzer and LED are currently on.

successEndConditions.condition: The buzzer and LED have been successfully turned off.

mainSequence.step: Korisnik presses the button on the remote control.
Mikrokontroler receives the signal from the button press.
Mikrokontroler sends a command to the Buzzer to turn it off.
Buzzer turns off in response to the command.
Mikrokontroler sends a command to the LED to turn it off.
LED turns off in response to the command.
